product_name: The Colorado Adventure Guide - Northern Edition
long_description: From hiking to biking to snowshoeing, cross country skiing and trail running, the. Author: Charlie Nuttelman. Softcover; 464 pages; full-color photographs and maps. Jagged Mountain Publishing; copyright 2012. Includes an extensive introduction with information related to navigation, equipment, safety and outdoor ethics. Easy-to-use icons and sidebars make it easy to choose an activity. Covers the following areas: Denver, Golden, Boulder foothills, northern Front Range, Rocky Mountain National Park, Mount Evans and surrounding wilderness, and Summit County. Also covers: Vail and Copper Mountain, Steamboat Springs and the Mt. Zirkel Wilderness, Winter Park and Fraser. .
short_description: From hiking to biking to snowshoeing, cross country skiing and trail running, the Colorado Adventure Guide - Northern Edition is your 1-stop shop for mile-high, muscle-powered adventure.
